engine.android.dao

类 DAOTemplate.DAOQueryBuilder<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • engine.android.dao.DAOTemplate.DAOQueryBuilder<T>
  • 封闭类:
    DAOTemplate

    public class DAOTemplate.DAOQueryBuilder<T>
extends Object
    This is a convenient utility that helps build 数据库查询语句
